original_text: For 40 days, the water on the earth became deeper. The water lifted the ship high above the ground.
korean_text: 홍수가 땅에 사십 일 동안 계속된지라 물이 많아져 방주가 땅에서 떠올랐고

sentences.original_text: the water on the earth became deeper.
The water lifted the ship high above the ground.
sentences.korean_translation: 물이 배를 땅에서 높이 들어 올렸습니다.
